text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: And with that said, that wraps up the explanation of the Spring Fan Appreciation Festival events and roles. Everyone should look over the documents, and submit their choices before the deadline！

text_block_list.name: Classmates
text_block_list.text: Okaaa～aaay！

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: An event where I could get a lot of new fans would be cool～！ By the way, that rumored "Event from Hell", do you want to participate？

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: No way, no way！ Besides, it seems like the Cheerleading Squad is recruiting this year too. But, I guess you wouldn't be able to enter any of the other events, huh？…… Hmmmm.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……The Cheerleading Squad, is it？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Fuu…… I've got it. This day is a day in which you should take action for the sake of the fans.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: If someone like me played an active role during the Fan Appreciation Festival, it would serve as proof that I'm first-class！！

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Fufuu～, to make the best use of my intellect, I'll be entering the Quiz Competition～.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah～, that's a valid choice too! By focusing on your strength, your intelligence, to show that you're competent both academically and physically.

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I-I'm thinking about entering the marathon. I don't know…… if I'm suited for it but, I want to give it a try.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That sounds good！ The Appreciation Festival has festival in its name after all, so it's a good chance to challenge something new.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I want the fans to enjoy it to the fullest！ Which event do you think I should sign up for！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh my…… Fufuu, if you already understand that much, then it'll be simple. Fans are, those who choose to support you as opposed to the many other Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's why, for them, you want to create a moment where they believe that they were right to choose you. People seek to follow those with an unshakeable dream and charisma.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Howaa, howaaaaaa……！ As expected of King-san…… that was very informational……！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I understand！！ So I just need to choose an event where I can show off that dream and charisma, with a bang！！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: By the way, King-san, which event do you plan on participating in！？ I just want to use it as reference！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: If it was me, I would choose an event that properly emphasizes my charm. Something that would have the spectators on the edge of their seat, an event with a considerable level of difficulty！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: However, that would leave some rather intense choices.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Like the Event from Hell, the 『Scavenger Hunt, Obstacle Course』, which is so severe that it's had a drastic decrease in participants. As a result, the attention it draws is low.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hooo～……! "Intense"…… "Difficult"……! Which means, if I'm able to finish it, everyone will be deeply moved……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Since participants continue to back out, for the sake of entertaining the fans, it's essential that you have suitable ability in that regard.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: If you half-heartedly participate, it's NG…… wait, huh？ Kawakami-san？

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Deeeeryaaaaaa～～～！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: …… I…… will！ Do…… My…… Best～～！！

text_block_list.name: Nearby Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Eh？ Seriously, Kawakami-san is participating in the 『Scavenger Hunt, 4000m Obstacle Course』？ That one that people keep retiring from every year？

text_block_list.name: Nearby Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Even if you work hard, not many people will come watch, right？ I've heard there aren't many people entering, you know？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That big idiot……！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Why is that what you're choosing……！？ You should listen all the way until the end……！

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text: Oh, Kawakami！ Tonight's dessert is chocolate taiyaki, and I heard there are only 3 left so they're holding a Rock-Paper-Scissors competition！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hieeeeeee！？ I-I'll participate…… in…… holding back…… on this……！

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text: Really？ You're fine not eating one？ Aren't they your favorite？

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Mu, mugugu…… it's fine！ More than that, if I can get one second faster――

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haa…… if it's difficult, and I can win……！ I'll also be a first-class Princess……！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I will…… I will also……！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Just like King-san……っ！！ And the fans too, I'll show that they were right to choose me……！

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Wow, Kawakami-san is still practicing for the Appreciation Festival. Well…… makes sense, just finishing the event itself is really hard.

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Even though she's practicing this late, if nobody shows up to cheer for her for the real race…… it'll be really depressing.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I heard about it you know, holding back from eating your favorite foods. Single-mindedly practicing for the event.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……to become a first-class Princess, going so far as to mimic me.

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hey, King. Tomorrow's the deadline for turning in the sign-up forms.

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: King, which event are you entering？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……The Cheerleading Squad means that you can't participate in any events. The normal King would never make that choice.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: However――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: On this occasion, King Halo is joining the Cheerleading Squad！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: The most suitable position for a King is at the top, therefore I have been appointed the Captain！ As a token of our new friendship, I've prepared outfits for everyone！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh…… outfits？ What do you mean？ Today's the Cheerleading Squad's "First Meeting" right？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes. But a King is someone who makes full use of their abilities！ Using my connections, I've prepared my designs and had them custom-made！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: This time we have only oooone goal！ Even if the events themselves don't get much attention, to liven up every single event to the absolute maximum！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: For those doing their best to receive suitable encouragement. That's exactly why――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We need something flashy, and unique！ We'll prepare some kind of gimmick！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh, eeeeeehh～……！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (After all, for that girl who's such a fan of mine, if she's decided to accept such an exceptional challenge)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (Then I have a responsibility to cheer her on, don't I？ ……The Appreciation Festival is meant to be for the sake of the fans, after all, isn't it？)
